contents:
美国民主党总统参选人Beto O'Rourke曾经将AR15单独拿出来说事，因此为他定制推特内容：

Beto says AR15 is designed to KILL. Now Hong Kong Police are pointing AR15s at hundreds of students in PolyU. The police have arrested all first aiders to delay medical response and sworn to repeat Tiananmen Square. FACT CHECKED. @BetoORourke Please DO SOMETHING right now!!
